(Ares) It's not because I don't trust you.

were like roaring lions in your tent.

you will see who is the lion... ...and who is the lamb.

text: Hiç gelen giden, giren çıkan oldu mu?

one has come in or left. No
one came or went, sir. Not even a bird flew

But we will not stand idly by either.
Bamsi, quickly assign your duties to the Alps.

text: Kimseye belli etmeden gizli giriş çıkışı arasınlar.

text: Burayı bulursak Ares'in bütün umutları yok olacak.

I know, Niko, you're trapped by your pen.

text: Buraya ticaret için, altın için geldin ama Ertuğrul savaş istedi.

text: Biliyorum ki zafer bizim olacaktır efendim.

text: Efendim, savaşın ne kadar süreceği belli değil.

I told you I need you here.
Ertuğrul will die tomorrow. You'll be by my side when

My prayers are always with you, sir.

Take this letter to the emperor.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im sana da, babana da yeniden diz çöktürecek.

english: your Ertuğrul Bey, the one you lean on, could come here?

text: Kadın başına boyunu aşan işlere kalkıştın.

we are doing everything we can for the funerals of our martyrs.

God never take you away from us.

Your intention is to please God.

Main. If you'll allow me, I'd like to perform

...and to fight for your justice. Do not let

Sir, what does this mean? They have abducted
my brother Turgut and Aslıhan Hatun . So
that scoundrel, who was supposed to be the brains behind it... ...that's why he

...has kept Turgut and Aslıhan Hatun captive in the encampment.

text: Beylik ihtirası yüzünden devletimize ihanet etti.
english: Driven by his lust for power, he betrayed our state. He

text: Mancınıkların yanmasında da onun parmağı vardır ana.

Treachery runs in his veins, mother.
I will unleash that treachery... ...in torrents.

text: Bana vekâleten cenaze namazına Artuk Bey iştirak etsin.
english: Artuk Bey attend the funeral prayer on my behalf.

text: Taziyede de şehit yakınlarını yalnız koymasın.
english: Even during condolence visits, they should not leave the families of martyrs alone. You shouldn't leave

english: Give strength and power to my Ertuğrul Bey.
Sound of horses neighing) This is the best place to set up an

english: ambush on the road to Çavdar Obası .
When Ertuğrul arrives, we will quickly surround him. If he falls into this ambush,

text: Burada pusuya düştüğünde bu kez kurtulamayacak.
Kılıcım nihayet güçlü bir Türk'ün kanıyla sulanacak.
english: My sword will finally be stained with the blood of a mighty Turk.
There is a secret passage in the castle.

text: Ares, imparatora bir ulakla mektup göndermekteydi.
english: Ares was sending a letter to the emperor via a messenger .

text: Ulak kaleden çıkmadan yakalayıp onun kılığında geçitten çıktım.
english: I caught the messenger before he left the fortress and, disguised as him, slipped out through the pass . I
also got hold of the letter.

text: Burada Bahadır Bey'le çevirdikleri işlerin hepsi yazılı.
english: they made with Mr. Bahadır are written here.
They've set a trap for you too, sir.
Thankfully, I arrived just in time.

text: Demek bu yüzden bana ulak gönderip beni obasına davet etti.
english: So that's why he sent a messenger to me and invited me to his tribe. They
ambushed me on the road and set a trap.
There's no time to lose, Atsız. It is

text: Tez vakitte bu soysuzun elinden Aslıhan Hatun'la...

english: necessary to rescue Aslıhan Hatun and Turgut Alp from this scoundrel's clutches as soon as possible.
We'll settle the score later. I know
where they're lying in ambush, sir .
They built it on the road we constantly travel.

text: İleride Çavdar Obası'na giden bir yol daha var.
english: Further on, there is another road leading to Çavdar Obası.

text: Bamsı, Abdurrahman, ben o yoldan Çavdar Obası'na varacağız.
english: Bamsi, Abdurrahman, and I will reach Cavdar Obası via that road.

text: Siz de diğer yoldan gidip pusularını başlarına yıkasınız Atsız.
english: You, Atsız, should take the other route and turn their ambush against them . Don't worry,

text: Onları tuzak içinde tuzağa düşürürüz evelallah.
english: will trap them one after another, God willing.

text: Ares'in askerlerinin işini bitirdikten sonra tez Çavdar Obası'na varasınız.
english: you've finished dealing with Ares' soldiers, you must quickly arrive at Çavdar Obası.
Some of you surround the camp...

text: ...bir kısmınız da içeri girip teyakkuzda beklesin.
english: ...while others go inside and remain on alert.
-The order is yours, sir. -The order is yours, sir.

text: Atsız, sen de askerlerin işini bitirdikten sonra...
english: Atsız, after you've finished with your soldiers ... ...
you should go to the Alps that are under siege. We will join you

text: Çavdar Obası'nda işimiz bittikten sonra biz de yanınıza geleceğiz.
english: after we finish our work in Çavdar Obası .
We will pass through the passage tonight.

text: Bu iş bu gece bitecek Atsız.
english: This job will be finished tonight, Atsız.

text: Allah yar ve yardımcımız olsun Alpler.
english: God be with us and help us, Alps.

text: Şu Ertuğrul'un ölüm haberini de hayırlısıyla bir alsaydık.
english: news of Ertuğrul's death, God willing.
I get tense like a bowstring the longer I wait.

text: Öyle ya da böyle Ertuğrul ölecek.
english: One way or another, Ertuğrul will die.

text: ...senin de ahvalin pek rahat değil gibidir.
english: ...but it seems your situation is n't very comfortable either.
Worms are gnawing at his insides. You

text: Senin dilinin altında bir şey var hatun.
english: have something up your sleeve, woman. Don't
speak in such an insinuating way. Just say
what you have to say plainly.
My lord, this Ertuğrul has nine lives.
What if he manages to get past the trap? What if he finds out that

text: Ya o tuzağı Ares'le senin kurduğunu anlarsa?
english: you and Ares set that trap ? The moment of truth has

text: Gayrı dananın kuyruğu çoktan kopmuştur hatun.
Eğer Ares'in tuzağından kurtulur ve benim beyliğimi tanımazsa...
english: If he escapes Ares' trap and does not recognize my rule...

text: ...o vakit Ertuğrul'un ölümü benim elimden olur.
english: ...then Ertuğrul's death will be at my hands.
This time you won't have a chance to escape.

text: Alpler yaklaşıyor ama içlerinde Ertuğrul yok.
english: The Alps are approaching, but Ertuğrul is not among them.
What do you mean Ertuğrul isn't there? I'm sure,
Ertuğrul is not among them. He
must have realized it was a trap.
He is going to Çavdar Obası.
What are we going to do?
I am going to Çavdar Obası. No matter what,

text: Her ne olursa olsun Ertuğrul bugün ölecek.

english: One problem ends only for another to begin.

text: Ne vakit elimizi bir şeye uzatsak...

english: My Ertuğrul, you opened a door for that snake called Bahadır...

text: ...eğri yoldan doğru yola girsin diye bir kapı açtı.
english: ...so that he might turn from the crooked path to the straight path .

text: Lakin o bu kapıyı kendi yüzüne kapattı.
english: But he slammed that door in his own face.

text: Ee, bunun da bedelini ödeyecektir tabii.
english: Well, they will pay the price for that, of course.
To detain Aslıhan Hatun and Turgut Alp...
...and to set up camp there, what does that even mean, mother? It turns out
he was involved in some really shady dealings.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im onun da hakkından gelecektir elbet.
english: Ertuğrul Bey will surely deal with him as well.
Haha, Gündüz, have you talked to your brothers?

text: Bir derdiniz olursa bana gelin dedim.
english: I told them, "If you have any problems, come to me." You did

text: İyi etmişsin Gündüz'üm, aferin. İyi etmişsin.
english: well, Gündüz, well done. You did well.

text: Hafsa kızım, cenaze aşları için her şey tamam edildi mi?
english: Hafsa, my daughter, has everything been prepared for the funeral meals?
The pots are boiling, the food is ready.

text: İyi o vakit, biz de ahaliye taziyeye gidelim.
english: Alright then, let's go and offer our condolences to the people.
(Sound of a neck breaking) (Sound of a sword)
It is time for war. Do
Titan is not among them. He can
go and have the secret passage closed.

text: Tez varıp gizli geçidin kapısını tutacağım.
english: arrive quickly and guard the secret passage .
I will wait for Ertuğrul Bey there. Hopefully,
after Mr. Bahadır finishes his work...
...you will also arrive safe and sound.
will come sooner or later. You foiled all the plots

text: Ertuğrul'un obamız için tezgâhladığı bütün oyunları bozdun beyim.
english: Ertuğrul had devised against our tribe, my lord .
I will also disrupt their games in Konya. Our sultan will also learn
how vengeful a man Ertuğrul is.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, iki Alp'iyle obaya doğru gelmekte.
english: Ertuğrul Bey is approaching the encampment with two of his Alps .
How did the father escape Ares' trap?
He should have come here dead, not alive.
Perhaps he never fell into the trap.
...don't you dare give away our game .

text: Yoksa bu otağ hepimizin mezarı olur.
english: Otherwise, this tent will become the grave of us all. Do

text: Sen de Aslıhan'la Turgut'un başında olasın.
english: You should be in charge of Aslıhan and Turgut, too . Keep
(Sound of horseshoes) (Sound of horses neighing) Since

text: Ertuğrul iki Alp'iyle sağ salim geldiğine göre tuzağa düşmemiş.
english: Ertuğrul and his two Alps arrived safe and sound, he did not fall into the trap. You must find

text: Ona beyliğini kabul ettirmenin bir yolunu bulmalısın beyim.
english: a way to make him accept your authority, my lord .

text: Eğer onu otağda öldürürsen sultanı karşına alırsın.
english: If you kill him in the tent, you will antagonize the sultan .

text: Devlete başkaldırmış olursun, bunun bedeli daha da ağır olur.
english: You would be rebelling against the state, and the consequences would be even more severe. He sent

text: Oğlunu sürgüne değil, Alplerini toplayıp isyan çıkarmaya göndermiş.
english: his son not into exile, but to gather his men and lead a rebellion.

text: Eceli ayağına gelmiştir beyim, geri çevirmek olmaz.
english: Death has come knocking at his door, sir, it's impossible to turn it away.
Look at how arrogant and haughty he is. It was

text: Sanki iki Alp'iyle değil, bir orduyla geldi.
english: as if he arrived not with two Alps, but with an entire army .
(Music - Exciting) Thank you, Ertuğrul Bey, for
...thank you very much. Please, come in
made preparations for you. Shall we

text: Konuşup, güzel bir yemek yiyelim ha?
english: talk and have a nice meal?
Where are Turgut and Aslıhan? Do
They are in good health. Let
's first talk about what we need to talk about.

text: Onları da aş yemeye davet ederiz.
english: We invite them to eat with us as well. Please, come in
Now you should say to me.

text: Ben cenkteyken himayem altındaki Çavdar Obası'nda neler oldu?
english: What happened in Çavdar Obası, which was under my protection, while I was at war?
Our tribe had an internal matter...
I have taken the kingdom that is rightfully mine. That's what happened
n't worry about Turgut and Aslıhan.
...I will hand them both over to you...
Which principality are you referring to, Mr. Bahadır? Is

text: Gardaş kanı dökerek almaya kalktığın beylikten mi?
english: it from the principality you attempted to seize by shedding brotherly blood?
To claim what is rightfully ours...
...you didn't even grant us the right to a child's play. You wanted to make

text: Kanımızdan olmayan birini obanın başına bey yapmak istedin!
english: someone who wasn't of our blood the chief of the tribe !
A few insolent individuals who refused to submit to my authority...
...got what they deserved, that's all. And what about the
gentlemen who were faithfully devoted to Aslıhan Hatun?
Why are you silent? Did the gold that
gave you to take Hanlı Bazaar ...

text: Sen ne dersin Ertuğrul Bey? Biz satılık değiliz.
english: What do you say, Ertuğrul Bey? We are not for sale. You are so corrupt that you would

text: Hakkı ve töreyi çiğneyecek kadar satılıksınız!

english: You have tarnished the name of rye!
You have violated his honor! You have ruined the
Sitting in my place, in my position...

text: Alplerimi emrine verip, seninle cenk etmek isterim.
english: give my Alps at your command and wish to fight you .

text: Ama sen iftira etmeye devam edersin.
english: But you continue to spread slander. Where did you get the idea that
the gold I won in war belonged to
will not allow you to humiliate my men. By failing to
they demonstrated just how despicable they are.

text: Sen de yaptığım mancınıklara sahip çıksaydın.
english: You should have taken care of the catapults I built .

text: Her seferinde Ares keferesinin tuzağına düştün.

english: ... despite everything... we want to stand by

text: ...devletimizin ve de senin yanında olmak isteriz.
english: our state and by you . Let
everyone in my village be a witness.
...you must bring Turgut Alp and Aslıhan Hatun here .
I will punish you for your collaboration and betrayal with Tekfur Ares.
What else could it be? Huh?

text: Siz bizi muhafaza etmeyi bırakın da...
english: Stop trying to protect us and
go save your master's head instead . Do
n't get your hopes up. You will

text: Bahadır Bey'in beyliğini kuzu kuzu tanıyacak...

english: ...both he and you will behave yourselves.
Otherwise, the blood that is shed...
...and the lives that are lost will be yours.
We have heard many who want to discipline us.
...there are bloodstains on all our weapons.
We are unlike any of them. Haven't
For us, all whores are the same. Do
We will not give you special treatment.
Your fate will be the same as theirs. Neither
of you is allowed to speak!

text: -Ne iş birliği? Biz hain miyiz? -Biz hain miyiz Ertuğrul Bey?
english: -What cooperation? Are we traitors? -Are we traitors, Ertuğrul Bey?
-What kind of collaboration? -We are not traitors.

text: Hanlı Pazar'ın altınları gözlerinizi boyamış beyler.
english: The gold of Hanlı Bazaar has deceived you, gentlemen. You tried to make

text: Ares'le iş birliği yapan bu adamı...
english: this man, who collaborated with Ares, the
lord of the honorable Çavdars . The one responsible for the burning of the catapults

text: Kalenin muhasarası için yaptırdığım mancınıkların yakılmasının...
english: I had built for the siege of the castle ...
...and furthermore, for the killing of my Alps ...
Ares and his men have formed an
alliance against our state in a wicked way .
...is the letter in which Ares tells the emperor everything...
a lie! You're slandering me! He told me everything, one by one:
how he did business with Bahadır...

text: ...buraya gelirken bana pusu kurup, beni nasıl öldüreceğini...
english: ...how he ambushed me and planned to kill me on my way here...

text: Gayrı, ne af dilemeniz sizi kurtarır...
english: At this point, neither begging for forgiveness nor pleading will save you...
will pay the price for your betrayal.
You're denying it in vain, Mr. Bahadır.
I have a spy inside the castle. The

text: Senin de, Ares'in de çevirdiğiniz kirli işler...
english: dirty dealings you and Ares have been involved in...
did not betray my country. I won't
But... if you keep going like
I'll take your head, just so you know. We want to carry on

text: Atamızın adını, soyunu devam ettirmek isteriz biz.
english: the name and lineage of our ancestors .
You can't stop this. You have defiled the

text: Şerefli Çavdar boyunun yürüdüğü yolu kirlettiniz.
english: path walked by the honorable Çavdar tribe .
You will pay for this... with your life.

text: Ertuğrul, diğer Türk obalarını bir arada tutuyor.
english: Ertuğrul is keeping the other Turkish tribes together .
They draw strength from it. They

text: Obalar zayıf. Ertuğrul olmazsa ayakta kalamazlar.
english: The settlements are weak. They cannot survive without Ertuğrul .
When Ertuğrul dies, the Turkish tribes will disperse.

text: Biz de fırsatı değerlendirip harekete geçeceğiz ve hepsini buradan defedeceğiz.
english: We will seize the opportunity, take action, and drive them all out of here.
What will happen to Hanlı Bazaar, sir? It's

text: Orayı da ele geçirmenin vakti geldi.
english: time to take over that place too.

text: Bu gece Hanlı Pazar'a bir baskın düzenleyeceğiz.
english: We're going to raid Hanlı Bazaar tonight. We will deliver a
second fatal blow to the Turks . I will throw

text: Döndüğümde herkese büyük bir şölen vereceğim.
english: a great feast for everyone when I return .
Sir, two of our soldiers are missing.
What do you mean lost? Where do they go?
I don't know sir, we couldn't find it anywhere.
I will personally handle it, sir.
I will wipe out your entire lineage! I will burn and
destroy your village! I will impale
the heads of their sons on the tip of my spear and...
...plant them in the middle of the village!
If you don't obey me... I'll
Now it's time to pay the price.

text: Beyim, buyurduğun üzere obayı içeriden ve dışarıdan kuşattık.
english: My lord, as you ordered, we have surrounded the camp from both inside and outside.
(Dumrul) We are in control of the tribe.
Thank you, brave men. Take the
-The order is yours, sir! -The order is yours, sir!

text: Sen de Aslıhan Hatun'la Turgut Alp'i getiresin.
english: You should bring Aslıhan Hatun and Turgut Alp as well . Yes sir, your wish is my command
(Breathing sound) I swore an oath that I would
take the head of the head and...
head of the leader is in my weapon.
...is there anyone among you who doesn't kneel?
Aslıhan, are you okay? Didn't I tell

text: Size konuşmak yok demedim mi? Ha?

english: You will not open your mouth!
What are you doing, you little dog? Are
you going to cut out our tongues, huh?
You will be a companion to hell for the lord.
Brother, just wait a bit. Just wait a

text: Cesetlerin kokusu her yeri sarmıştı efendim.
english: smell of corpses permeated everywhere, sir.
We found them like this when we arrived.

text: Bu işin arkasında Ertuğrul var efendim.
english: Ertuğrul is behind this, sir. How

text: Bana Ertuğrul'un kalenin içinde bir adamı olduğunu mu söylüyorsun?
english: me Ertuğrul has a man inside the castle ?

text: Bütün yeni gelen askerleri, herkesi! Kalenin dışındaki sivilleri bile!
english: All the newly arrived soldiers, everyone! Even the civilians outside the fortress!
Find him for me! Yes sir, please
You didn't leave our lives in the hands of this scoundrel.
Brother, your life is my life! Would I ever

text: Beyimiz o Bahadır itinin işini gördü mü?
english: our lord take care of that Bahadır dog?
He saw it, brother, how could he not?

text: Aslıhan Hatun'u çözesin, otağa gidelim. Ertuğrul Bey'imiz bizi bekler.
english: Untie Aslıhan Hatun, then let's go to the tent. Our Ertuğrul Bey is waiting for us.
Come on Aslıhan, let's go to the tent. Thank you.
What's going on in the camp?

text: Efendim, Ertuğrul Bey obayı ele geçirmiş.
english: Sir, Ertuğrul Bey has captured the tribe.

text: Bahadır Bey ve oğlunu öldürüp, beylere diz çöktürmüş.
english: He killed Bahadır Bey and his son, and forced the lords to kneel before him .

text: Bahadır Bey'in de Alpleri teslim olmuş.
english: Bahadır Bey's Alps have also surrendered.
Ertuğrul will go to the castle from here.

text: Kaleyi savunmak için içeri girip, gizli geçidin kapısını kapamamız gerek.
english: To defend the castle, we need to go inside and close the secret passage.
We will enter when Ertuğrul Bey arrives.
The conquest will be completed tonight, God willing.

text: Ares benim kalede olmadığımı öğrenince işkillenip...
english: Ares might become suspicious when he learns I'm not in the castle and ...
...there is only one verdict for traitors .
...paid the price for his unrestrained ambition...
Whoever violates or betrays the law for the sake of their own self-interest or
their head will be in my hands. Sir
God be pleased with you, sir.
You arrived just in time, like a savior.

text: Hain kalbi hançer yemeden rahat durmayacaktı.
english: treacherous heart wouldn't rest until it was stabbed in the back.
From now on, the principality is yours, Turgut Bey.
From now on, the command is yours in my tribe.
Show obedience! Don't think that by

text: İtaat etmekle bütün kabahatlerinizden sıyrıldınız sanmayın.
english: obeying you you've absolved yourself of all your sins .
Of course, there will be consequences for your actions.
We will pass judgment on these matters... ...after the war, Mr. Turgut.
If there weren't a single traitor among us...
...the power of a thousand scoundrels outside...

text: İmdi sıra düşmanın kellesini almaya geldi.
english: Now it's time to take the enemy's head .
